page.title: 15FARMING : Arable crops
page.content: The crops grown on Easter Balrymonth farm are sold, often at a set price,to various wholesalers. Peas grown and harvested as part of a co-operative are packaged and sold as freezer peas. The oil seed rape goes to make cooking oil and margarine. Some barley grown on the farm goes for malting and the rest for the feeding of livestock. Similarly,wheat goes for milling and animal feed. The acreage under potatoes is strictly limited by quotas and there is a heavy fine if the limit is exceeded. The barley is the crop best suited to the soil in this area and now winter barley is being grown more than in previous years.This has come about with the aid of chemicals used on the crop and better varieties of seed. The market price is currently dropping for many crops because of surpluses.
